医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
观察：美国老年人表示，他们感觉自己被困在医疗保险优势计划中随着私人医疗保险优惠计划的注册人数不断增加，人们对保险覆盖效果的担忧也随之增加，其中包括一些人表示，由于健康状况恶化，他们被困在私人计划中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Watch-Older-Americans-say-they-feel-stuck-in-Medicare-Advantage-plans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Watch-Older-Americans-say-they-feel-stuck-in-Medicare-Advantage-plans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab7bcca8-5f60-4986-bb72-9da7eef76c3f Mon, 22 Jan 2024 07:27:01 -0500 Watch: Older Americans say they feel stuck in Medicare Advantage plans
联邦立法者迈出了监管 500 亿美元阿片类药物和解协议的第一步一些国会议员要求联邦政府对数十亿美元的阿片类药物解决方案进行监督，州和地方政府在过去两年中开始支出这些资金，其中一些议员用它来填补预算漏洞，而不是应对成瘾危机。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Federal-lawmakers-take-first-steps-toward-oversight-of-2450-billion-in-opioid-settlements.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Federal-lawmakers-take-first-steps-toward-oversight-of-2450-billion-in-opioid-settlements.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=114e156e-b074-4a1c-a461-2a1b77a18c5e Mon, 22 Jan 2024 07:22:41 -0500 Federal lawmakers take first steps toward oversight of $50 billion in opioid settlements
地中海饮食也许能够改善你的睡眠研究人员审查了地中海饮食与睡眠质量之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/The-Mediterranean-Diet-may-be-able-to-improve-your-sleep.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/The-Mediterranean-Diet-may-be-able-to-improve-your-sleep.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=09b9b0a3-ac10-4ae4-bb2a-6ace864b76f0 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 06:24:00 -0500 The Mediterranean Diet may be able to improve your sleep
地理和气候如何影响葡萄酒的品质及其健康益处？研究人员审查了葡萄酒及其酚类衍生物的健康益处和质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/How-does-geography-and-climate-impact-wine-quality-and-its-health-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/How-does-geography-and-climate-impact-wine-quality-and-its-health-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5c791d70-1d76-41b6-a487-e9f74058b8e9 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 06:19:00 -0500 How does geography and climate impact wine quality and its health benefits?
科学家发现肺动脉高压的可能治疗靶点马德里国家心血管研究中心 (CNIC) 的 Guadalupe Sabio 博士领导的团队发现了肺动脉高压的可能治疗靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Scientists-discover-a-possible-therapeutic-target-for-pulmonary-hypertension.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Scientists-discover-a-possible-therapeutic-target-for-pulmonary-hypertension.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebc81d2f-ccb7-4ddc-a593-73b22e18873d Mon, 22 Jan 2024 06:09:02 -0500 Scientists discover a possible therapeutic target for pulmonary hypertension
深部脑刺激可改善帕金森病患者的生活质量研究人员比较了单独药物治疗或丘脑底核深部脑刺激对帕金森病患者生活质量的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Deep-brain-stimulation-may-improve-quality-of-life-in-Parkinson-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Deep-brain-stimulation-may-improve-quality-of-life-in-Parkinson-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efd4041b-8f0a-4d1f-a581-ddddc003ac63 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 04:50:00 -0500 Deep brain stimulation may improve quality of life in Parkinsons disease
研究表明减肥和缓解糖尿病对心脏和肾脏有持久的好处RCSI 医学与健康科学大学人口健康学院的研究人员提供了新的证据，证明减肥努力对健康有益，可以缓解 2 型糖尿病患者的糖尿病症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-shows- permanent-benefits-of-weight-loss-and-diabetes-remission-for-the-heart-and-kidneys.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Study-shows- permanent-benefits-of-weight-loss-and-diabetes-remission-for-the-heart-and-kidneys.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02b1146b-3de3-45fa-a439-484adfb73b7d Mon, 22 Jan 2024 04:08:00 -0500 Study shows lasting benefits of weight loss and diabetes remission for the heart and kidneys
空气污染对心脏的影响程度低得惊人，但饮食可能提供保护芬兰最近的一项研究表明，接触空气污染物，即使浓度非常低，也与心脏代谢危险因素的不利变化有关https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Air-pollution-affects-the-heart-at-surprisingly-low-levels-but-diet-may-offer-protection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Air-pollution-affects-the-heart-at-surprisingly-low-levels-but-diet-may-offer-protection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af4ad473-91a0-481e-b715-8a9e595df3fe Mon, 22 Jan 2024 04:06:00 -0500 Air pollution affects the heart at surprisingly low levels, but diet may offer protection
医疗保健公司利用人工智能应对供应链挑战《Economist Impact》由 DP World 支持的新研究显示，46% 的医疗保健行业公司正在使用人工智能 (AI) 来识别和解决其供应链中的潜在中断，这突显了该行业对适应性和弹性的承诺。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Healthcare-companies-harness-AI-to-navigate-supply-chain-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Healthcare-companies-harness-AI-to-navigate-supply-chain-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=328f63c8-c2c2-47ef-8418-5d0f6ef77ef8 Mon, 22 Jan 2024 04:04:00 -0500 Healthcare companies harness AI to navigate supply chain challenges
科学家发现受 COVID-19 影响的关键脑细胞最近的一项细胞干细胞研究调查了 SARS-CoV-2 感染是否会导致多巴胺能神经元衰老。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Scientists-discover-key-brain-cells-affected-by-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240122/Scientists-discover-key-brain-cells-affected-by-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=898c3d95-d4b7-494a-8f57-ffda6f69f13c Mon, 22 Jan 2024 04:03:00 -0500 Scientists discover key brain cells affected by COVID-19
